verses.verse: So <S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H609>Asa<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%> In his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H8252>quiet<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God:<s%>

For he <S%H5493>took<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of the <S%H5236>strange<s%> gods, and the <S%H1116>high<s%> places, and <S%H7665>broke<s%> down the <S%H4676>images,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> down the <S%H842>groves:<s%>

And <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment.<s%>

Also he <S%H5493>took<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places and the images: and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H8252>quiet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4694>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest,<s%> and he had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> in <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given him <S%H5117>rest.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> Let us <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and make <S%H5437>about<s%> them <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and <S%H4026>towers,<s%> <S%H1817>gates,<s%> and <S%H1280>bars,<s%> while the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us; <S%H3588>because<s%> we have <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> we have <S%H1875>sought<s%> him, and he has given us <S%H5117>rest<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side.<s%> So they <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H6743>prospered.<s%>

And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> an <S%H2428>army<s%> of men that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H6793>targets<s%> and <S%H7420>spears,<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7239>thousand;<s%> <S%H505><s%> and out of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> and <S%H1869>drew<s%> <S%H7198>bows,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H7239>thousand:<s%> <S%H505><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And there <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H413>against<s%> them <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> with an <S%H2428>host<s%> of a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4818>chariots;<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4762>Mareshah.<s%>

Then <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H6440>against<s%> him, and they set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H6859>Zephathah<s%> at <S%H4762>Mareshah.<s%>

And <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> it is <S%H369>nothing<s%> with you to <S%H5826>help,<s%> <S%H996>whether<s%> with <S%H7227>many,<s%> or with them that have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3581>power:<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> us, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> for we <S%H8172>rest<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> you, and in your <S%H8034>name<s%> we <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1995>multitude.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you are our <S%H430>God;<s%> let no <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H6113>prevail<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you.

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H609>Asa,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

And <S%H609>Asa<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them to <S%H1642>Gerar:<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> were <S%H5307>overthrown,<s%> that they could not <S%H4241>recover<s%> <S%H1992>themselves;<s%> for they were <S%H7665>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4264>host;<s%> and they <S%H5375>carried<s%> away <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H1642>Gerar;<s%> for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> on them: and they <S%H962>spoiled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities;<s%> for there was <S%H7235>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H961>spoil<s%> in them.

They <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H7617>carried<s%> <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
